title: Which country is best between Azerbaijan and Georgia? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which is best? That’s a difficult question to answer! Best in what? Georgia is better at Georgian alphabet. Literally invented there. Azerbaijan is probably best at confusing people on how to spell the name of their country. They are pretty equal on how many seas they are touching (1 each). Both countries compete in European sport/art competitions (like football and Eurovision). Azerbaijan has a younger population compared to Georgia (Georgia Age structure & Central Intelligence Agency) with 30 VS 39 years old They are pretty even in male/female ratio (1.12 VS 1.11) Azerbaijan is ranked 73rd in GDP PPP while Georgia is ranked 116th (2017) List of countries by GDP (PPP) - Wikipedia Living in Georgia is more expensive in general except when it comes to purchasing power where Georgia is around 10% better than Azerbaijan: Cost Of Living Comparison Between Georgia And Azerbaijan If we compare the capitals (Baku and Tbilisi), we can see that there are high differences in prices: Cost of Living Comparison Between There are more private universities than public in Georgia: List of universities in Georgia (country) - Wikipedia It’s the opposite in Azerbaijan: List of universities in Azerbaijan - Wikipedia So now you tell me which one is the best… ? You can find a full comparison here: Azerbaijan vs. Georgia

I am from Azerbaijan but my father is Georgian Azeri. There are nearly half million azeris living in Georgia since many centuries. As a result I have been in Georgia very often to visit my grandparents who live in there. In my experience, Georgia is better place in terms of nature, hospitality of people, safety, human rights and corruption. Azerbaijan, though, is better to work and overall richer than Georgia. Azerbaijan also is bigger and a bit more developed than Georgia. Finding a job in Azerbaijan is also easier than in Georgia and as a result many azeris come to Azerbaijan from Georgia for work. PS. Recetlu due to low oil prices salaries in Azerbaijan have decreased and I am not sure about job prospects in Azerbaijan compared to Georgia.
